channel.title: How do i make barrage freeze players(delta)or move by folowing or atacking?
channel.description: i have a delta server (im not a noob, pretty good with coding) but i forgot/need to know, how to make the ice barrage spell accualy freeze for good. as in not moving AT ALL, people can just follow or atack you and they can move again, i want that fixed=[

item.title: How do i make barrage freeze players(delta)or move by folowing or atacking?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape

@smkscape wrote:

Did you compile and added under it ?

item.title: How do i make barrage freeze players(delta)or move by folowing or atacking?
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

didnt work…[quote=“smkscape, post:3, topic:253360”]Go client.java search :

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) {

You see someting like this :

boolean UseCrossBow = false; if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) { UseCrossBow = true; }

under that add:

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastEntangle < entangleDelay) { sM("A magical force stops you from moving."); return; }

Compile and Done[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make barrage freeze players(delta)or move by folowing or atacking?
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

Go client.java search :

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) {

You see someting like this :

boolean UseCrossBow = false; if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) { UseCrossBow = true; }

under that add:

if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastEntangle < entangleDelay) { sM("A magical force stops you from moving."); return; }

Compile and Done
